name: HOW TO PLAY
text: To move forward use the D or right arrow key

name: HOW TO PLAY
text: Moving backwards is just as easy, use either the A or left arrow key

name: HOW TO PLAY
text: Want to jump? Use either the W, up arrow or space bar

name: HOW TO PLAY
text:
Collect all the coins without dying.
Want to restart? Press R
